The primary aim study determine lipoic acid omega-3 fatty acid improve cognitive function 12-weeks people multiple sclerosis baseline score least two standard deviation normative value one four cognitive test include , Paced Auditory Serial Addition Task ( PASAT ) , Stroop Color-Word Test , California Verbal Learning Test-II ( CVLT-II ) , Controlled Oral Word Association Test ( COWAT ) . The secondary aim determine treatment effect marker endothelial inflammation , insulin dysregulation , mitochondrial dysfunction may relate cognitive dysfunction measure s-ICAM-1 level , homeostasis model insulin resistance ( HOMA-IR ) , MRI phosphorus image subset study participant . The study also measure safety adverse event report laboratory measure ; plasma fatty acid level ; serum lipoic acid level .
